channel.title: Claws on 508? :S
channel.description: Ok my source is bulby, and i added the d claws spec to rune claws (item id: 3101) and when i spawn them, i cant equip them to use them Help? DX

item.title: Claws on 508? :S
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

[quote=“ak226688, post:2, topic:266093”]omfg ur making me twitch i cant stand seeing things about claw help it drives me mad there must be ovr 10 posts a day about claws
and i dnt even see why there so special i meen wudent u rather have a new sword or summot not crappy claws[/quote]

what the fuck, help this guy or dont post at all.

Read full topic

Add them in the appropriate array in Equipment.java in the packets folder.
